SELECT MC.CouponNo AS couponNo, MC.CouponType AS couponType, MC.RuleCode AS ruleCode, MC.CouponCode AS couponCode, MC.MemCode AS memCode, MC.Mobile AS memberMobile, G.MemberCode AS userMemCode, CONVERT(VARCHAR, MC.StartTime, 23) AS startTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, MC.EndTime, 23) AS endTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, MC.CreateTime, 120) AS createTime, MC.Status AS status, MC.ValidFlag AS validFlag, MC.BPCode AS bpCode, MC.RelatedNoA AS relationBill, MC.UserBP AS userBP, D.DepartCode AS departCode , D.DepartName AS departName FROM Promotion.BIN_MemberCoupon MC WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN Campaign.BIN_GetIntelligentResultMain G WITH(NOLOCK) ON (MC.RelatedNoB=G.TradeNoIF AND MC.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = G.BIN_OrganizationInfoID) LEFT JOIN Sale.BIN_SaleRecord C WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC.RelatedNoA = C.BillCode LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization D WITH(NOLOCK) ON C.BIN_OrganizationID=D.BIN_OrganizationID WHERE MC.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
MC.CouponNo = #couponNo#
MC.CouponType = #couponType#
MC.CouponCode = #couponCode#
(EndTime IS NULL OR CONVERT(DATE, MC.EndTime) >= CONVERT(DATE, #startTime#))
CONVERT(DATE, MC.StartTime) <= CONVERT(DATE, #endTime#)
MC.Status = #status#
MC.RelatedNoA = #relationBill#
( MC.UserBP = #bpCode# OR MC.BPCode = #bpCode#)
MC.ValidFlag = #validFlag#
MC.ValidFlag = '1'
MC.RuleCode = #couponRule#

SELECT DISTINCT MC.CouponNo AS couponNo, MC.RuleCode AS ruleCode, MC.CouponType AS couponType, MC.CouponCode AS couponCode, MC.RelatedNoA AS relationBill, MC.UserBP AS userBP, MC.BPCode AS bpCode, G.MemberCode AS userMemCode, G.MemberPhone AS userMobile, CONVERT(VARCHAR, MC.StartTime, 23) AS startTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, MC.EndTime, 23) AS endTime, MC.ValidFlag AS validFlag, CONVERT(VARCHAR,MC.FinshTime , 120) AS useTime, G.TradeNoIF AS billCode, G.CounterCode AS counterCode, CI.CounterNameIF AS counterName, G.MemberName AS memberName, G.TotalQuantity AS totalQuantity, G.OriginalAmount AS originalAmount, G.DiscountAmount AS discountAmount, G.IntegralAmount AS integralAmount, G.TotalAmount AS totalAmount FROM Promotion.BIN_MemberCoupon MC WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_GetIntelligentResultMain G WITH(NOLOCK) ON (MC.RelatedNoB=G.TradeNoIF AND MC.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = G.BIN_OrganizationInfoID) LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemCardInfo MCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON G.MemberCode = MCI.MemCode LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemberInfo MI WITH(NOLOCK) ON MCI.BIN_MemberInfoID = MI.BIN_MemberInfoID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo CI WITH(NOLOCK) ON G.CounterCode=CI.CounterCode WHERE MC.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND MC.Status = 'OK'
MC.CouponNo = #couponNo#
MC.CouponType = #couponType#
(EndTime IS NULL OR CONVERT(DATE, MC.EndTime) >= CONVERT(DATE, #startTime#))
CONVERT(DATE, MC.StartTime) <= CONVERT(DATE, #endTime#)
MC.RelatedNoA = #relationBill#
MC.UserBP = #bpCode#
MC.ValidFlag = #validFlag#
MC.ValidFlag = '1'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE Promotion.BIN_MemberCoupon SET StartTime = #startTime#, EndTime = #endTime# WHERE CouponNo =#couponNo#
